iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { 69 08 E2 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // IN AL, 0x08 + LOOPE check
        $pattern1 = { 50 50 50 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // Pushes + RtlFreeHeap call
        $pattern2 = { E2 ?? ?? ?? ?? 7E ?? ?? ?? }  // LOOPE + JLE conditional check

    condition:
        any of them
}
